narrative.inOrderTo: user of google geo code api

scenario.title: Get geocode for Amphitheatre Parkway
scenario.step: Given I have an address 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA
When I request google api for geocode with address
Then I should get response status code 200
And I should get longitude -122.08561 and latitude 37.42241

scenario.title: Get geocode for Winnetka
scenario.step: Given I have an address Winnetka
When I request google api for geocode with address
Then I should get response status code 200
And I should get longitude -87.735895 and latitude 42.10808340000001
